personal_hobbies.fun_fact: I have a passion for cooking and love experimenting with flavors! You can check out my creations on my Instagram page @amrsteak.
I'm also an epee fencer. Fencing requires focus, agility, and a strategic mindset, which I really enjoy!
Fitness is important to me, so I train in calisthenics to build strength and flexibility.
